title: Open a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Add Delivery Address' button, open the dialog.

title: Close a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Cancel' button inside a modal dialog, activate the button to close the dialog.

title: Navigate to the last focusable element in a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Street' input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the 'Cancel' button in the same dialog.

title: Navigate to the first focusable element in a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Cancel' button inside a modal dialog, navigate to the 'Street' input in the same dialog.

title: Navigate to the beginning of a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Street' input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the beginning of the dialog.

title: Navigate to the end of a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Street' input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the end of the dialog.

title: Bump into the top edge of a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Cancel' button, navigate to the top of the modal dialog, attempt to navigate past the top edge, and then navigate away from the top edge into the dialog content.

title: Bump into the bottom edge of a modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Cancel' button, navigate to the bottom of the modal dialog, attempt to navigate past the bottom edge, and then navigate away from the bottom edge into the dialog content.

title: Open a nested modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Add' button inside a modal dialog, open the nested 'Address Added' dialog.

title: Close a nested modal dialog
instructions: Starting at the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.

title: Close a nested modal dialog using a button
instructions: Starting at the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, activate the button to close the dialog.

title: Open a nested modal dialog using a link
instructions: Starting at the 'your profile' link inside a modal dialog, open the nested 'End of the Road!' dialog.
